name: Grim Swarm
description:
In 20 seconds the infinite swarm of the undead will arrive and there is nothing you can do about it, so collect all your weapons and take down as many zombies as you can to the grave!

See how high of a Highscore you can get to unlock all weapons and hats!

Inspired by an old flash game called De-animator, check it out if you can!

Made for the "20 second Jam", I interpreted the theme a little bit more loosely, in 20 seconds the zombie horde comes to kill you and you cannot kill all of them, so it's a countdown to see how many you can kill before you die.

Controls:

A,D - Walks.
R - Reload.
Left mouse button - Shoot.
Esc - Return to the Menu.
When shooting you only hit what you are actually aiming at, so you need to precisely aim the mouse over the enemies to hit them, you won't catch them with strays.

Also, any feedback is greatly appreciated!
